document_data.name: Rhodea Firehair
document_data.mainbody: '''Rhodea Firehair''' was a powerful [[Evoker|invoker]] living in [[Aluarim]] in [[Halruaa]] in [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Rhodea's personality matched her surname. Contrary to most [[wizard]]s, Rhodea was often seen at the front line of any battle or conflict, fearlessly leading those around her to victory. With a wide array of destructive spells, she was truly a force to be reckoned with.
document_data.Activities:
Rhodea was the only Elder on the [[Council of Elders (Halruaa)]] who never missed a call to meeting from [[Zalathorm Kirkson]].

She took it upon herself to make sure the [[Royal Mint]] was run effectively and fairly.
document_data.Relationships:
During the last few months of her life, Rhodea tutored a [[loxo]] named [[Dauphal]] who approached her because she was not afraid of him. She taught him the rudiments of [[the Art]], of which he was fascinated and awestruck.{{Cite web/Realms Personalities/Dauphal}}

Rhodea had a daughter that was killed a short while after Rhodea's passing.
document_data.History: Sometime in the early [[1370 DR|1370s DR]], Rhodea was killed at the town mint in an accident involving a [[dragon]].
